description: Introduction to programming logic and concepts with emphasis on syntax, structure, and real-world applications, including use of an Integrated Development Environment (IDE).
Fundamental web design skills covering HTML5, CSS3, and common web design frameworks to build responsive websites.
Introduction to computer science and programming using the Java language with emphasis on problem solving, algorithm design, and program development.
Introduction to developing software systems integrated with databases, file systems, and web technologies.
Essay writing with emphasis on process, purpose, audience awareness, organization, development, and engagement with outside texts.
Advanced writing course with emphasis on research paper writing, developing a focused thesis, and supporting arguments in organized essays.
